messages.title: WE DESERVE BETTER THAN THIS BREXIT MESS
messages.content: Boris Johnson leads most unpopular new government in 40 years. - Independent, August 2019. Former PM Sir John Major, 'The NHS is about as safe with them as a pet hamster would be with a hungry python,' - BBC 1 Andrew Marrs Show

messages.title: WE CAN'T TRUST THEM WITH OUR NHS
JEREMY CORBYN - DEAL OR NO DEAL LEAVE OR REMAIN

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
The Liberal Democrats will take urgent action to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: INVEST IN SCHOOLS AND OUR NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work every day to ensure our children get to go to the best schools in the world. The Liberal Democrats will invest billions more to secure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect.

issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
issues.education: As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work every day to ensure our children get to go to the best schools in the world.
issues.environment: The Liberal Democrats will take urgent action to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats will invest billions more to secure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect.

endorsements.endorsement: Boris Johnson leads most unpopular new government in 40 years.
The NHS is about as safe with them as a pet hamster would be with a hungry python.

quotes.text: The NHS is about as safe with them as a pet hamster would be with a hungry python.
Boris Johnson leads most unpopular new government in 40 years.

images.caption: VOTE FOR RAY GEORGESON YOUR REMAIN CANDIDATE VOTE LIBERAL DEMOCRAT
